title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-7.3 - Hours of work
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1625-7.3 - Hours of work

State Regulations

Hours of work shall be established by the authority so
as to provide necessary coverage for project operation. Where possible, office
hours and hours of work per week shall conform with those of the
municipality. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1625-7.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
